Zone Limits: From 100m-1500m from the right of way boundary of the Expressway.
Minimum plot size (Sq.m): Development plan or in the absence of a Development Plan, based on the future land use and the physical condition of thee area.

Zone Limits: 1500m radius from toll centers of Expressways.
Minimum plot size (Sq.m): Development plan or in the absence of a Development Plan, based on the future land use and the physical condition of thee area.
Terms & Conditions: i. All terms and conditions of Development Control Zone and Low Density Zone shall be applicable.
ii. All other terms of the Development Control Zone I (30m-100m) shall be applied until the Development Guide Plan is prepared.
